text: The single biggest headache when onboarding new users to julia is that it does not add `julia` to the environment variables, leading to issues for people wanting to use VSCode, the terminal or practically any other widespread usage than double-clicking the “julia” icon. Why doesn’t it do that? We calculate on average 30 minutes at the beginning of every workshop to try to get people around this problem
